title: Lower Left Crayon

nouns: A stick of colored chalk or wax used for drawing.
A crayon is a stick of colored wax, charcoal, chalk or other material.
A stick of colored wax, charcoal, chalk or other material used for writing and drawing
Writing implement consisting of a colored stick of composition wax used for writing and drawing

description:
A crayon, as children use to color. Depicted as red on most platforms with two black stripes on its label, resembling a Crayola crayon. Positioned at a 45° angle, its tip at the lower left. Commonly used for various content concerning drawing, colors, arts and crafts, and schooling.

WhatsApp’s crayon is green while Facebook’s is orange.
apple_vendor_description: Apple's crayon emoji is depicted with a vibrant, rich color, showcasing a tactile texture that suggests wax, all rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. The soft rounded edges and realistic lighting make it appear like a well-loved art supply, ready for creative expression. It's commonly used to represent art, creativity, childhood, or the simple joy of drawing and coloring.
